content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message suggesting using the TensorFlow library to create a machine learning model that can learn to play the game based on input data. I executed the "write_to_file" command with the given filename "league_of_legends_bot_tensorflow.txt" and text "We can use the TensorFlow library to create a machine learning model that can learn to play the game based on input data", and the file was written to successfully.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "league_of_legends_bot_riot_api.txt", "text": "We can use the Riot Games API to retrieve information about the game state and the player\'s account."}}}', type='ai_response')]
"""
